title: Krome v1.8 [Satfoun] {AMRG}
description:
THIS APP NEED CHROME WITH RICH NOTIFICATIONS ENABLED!

Check your browser version and update it to the newest one (rich notifications are available on Chrome v27 on Windows and are coming soon to Mac OS)!

Krome is a simple app that allows you to sync your Android notifications with Chrome on your PC. Just install this application on device, download Chrome extension and you are ready to go!

After configuration you can disable selected applications from showing notifications in Chrome. Krome also allows you to reply to SMS messages right from your browser - just click button below notification, write your reply and click send!

SECURITY / PRIVACY
The app uses a secure connection to transfer the data. All notifications are sent via Google Cloud Messaging service. We keep small portions of data (app icons etc) on our servers and right after receiving notification on Chrome, we delete them.

App allows to send SMS messages, but you can disable that functionality in settings.

What's in this version : (Updated : Jul 20, 2013)
Krome moved to Amazon servers! Update to version 1.8 to get working notifications!
To everyone who have problems with app - servers were most of the time dead, but this can still happen.
Recent changes:
Fix for random SMS notification showing after start of app
Fix fot sending SMS
Moved to Amazon
Encryption is turned off as default
Some translations are fixed
Fixed some Force Closes
Compability with tablets
